text: Sergei Vladimirovich Mandreko (; 1 August 1971 – 8 March 2022) was a Russian- Tajik football coach and player. He played as a midfielder. He played for CIS, Russia and Tajikistan. From 2008 until 2009 Mandreko worked as an assistant manager under Rashid Rakhimov during his time with FC Lokomotiv Moscow.
